Class TeachersFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • com.cvlcondorcet.condor.TeachersFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.support.v4.app.LoaderManager.LoaderCallbacks<java.util.List<TeachersAbsence>>, android.support.v7.widget.SearchView.OnQueryTextListener, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class TeachersFragment
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment
implements android.support.v4.app.LoaderManager.LoaderCallbacks<java.util.List<TeachersAbsence>>, android.support.v7.widget.SearchView.OnQueryTextListener
    Displays a RecyclerView (for absences) and a search field (to filter absences by name)
    Author:
    Quentin DE MUYNCK
    See Also:
    TeachersAbsence, TeachersLoader, RecyclerViewAdapterProfs
